system.description: Your fight or flight response is finely honed - able to get you out of the stickiest of situations. The user gains the Ability Adrenaline as a Tutored Ability, and once during battle, when the user crosses the [Desperation 1/2] threshold, they freely use either U-Turn or No Retreat, as if it was on their Active List.
